Text:
function EP03_18()
    --.承-8【8月第2週】「女装少年だって十年後には一般教養」
    SaveData.Title = "女装少年だって十年後には一般教養"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0351.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Welcome back~. You were surprisingly late today." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0352.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "There's curry in the fridge that's been chilled, so please warm it up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0535.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile · Casual clothes
 "I'm the one who made and chilled that curry, and Akira, you're going to eat it with me, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirk · Roomwear
 "Maintaining pride even under complete protection. That's the dignity of us professional shut-ins." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0536.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile · Casual clothes
 "Then I'll get the rice ready while you warm it up. Medium portion? Large?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "For a big eater like Minachin, a medium portion is a giga portion for me, so a small portion please." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0355.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirk · Roomwear
 "It's because I'm a hikikomori—get it? How's that?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0537.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered · Casual clothes
 "W-Whoa! Don't joke around while I'm serving the rice! I can't retort!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0356.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness · Roomwear
 "You don’t have an obligation to retort or anything… How dutiful of you." ]])

    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    MSG([[ We both finished the leftover curry cleanly. ]])

    MSG([[ While drinking coffee after the meal, I told Akira everything about today's events—what I heard from Ryuguuin-san and the walk with Hermes-san. ]])
    --//BU：アキラ（通常・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0357.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "I see. I can understand the conservative faction’s stance. But well, like Hermes said, there’s no need to worry about it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0538.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile · Sweat · Casual clothes
 "That’s so straightforward…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Because the conservatives are oppressing the boys' division, right? It’s just as tough for the boys' division too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Yet they say things like ‘We’re the victims, don’t blame us, wahhh,’ which I just can’t accept." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0539.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal · Casual clothes
 "But we boys' division are definitely the minority, right? I also think the opinions of the majority, the girls, deserve respect." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirk · Roomwear
 "That’s old-fashioned, Minachin. When you try to change something, you have to start from the minority’s position. That’s obvious." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0540.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised · Casual clothes
 "W-What do you mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirk · Roomwear
 "I’ll explain using the example of the penguin, the flightless bird and the well-known mascot of Nippon Ichi Software." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira began quickly sketching a drawing with a pen on some nearby paper. ]])


    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//CG：ペンギンの歴史①～飛べないペンギン～
    LAYER_LOAD(50, "CI061a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You probably know this too, but penguins don’t fly—not because they don’t want to, but because they can’t. They apparently could fly originally, but their wings degenerated." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0541.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I heard that on an animal variety show. It’s interesting how something you could do can degenerate like that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, it’s natural for unnecessary abilities to degenerate. Even we humans have weaker jaw and grip strength compared to monkeys." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0364.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Now why flying became unnecessary is the issue. If you were a wild animal, Minachin, why would you want to fly?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0542.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Um? Because it feels good? It’d be nice to flutter all around." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0365.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You wouldn’t develop such a complicated lifestyle just for fun… It’s because of predators. The sky is the best place to escape from them." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0543.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, that makes sense. No matter how fast a beast is on foot, it can’t chase you into the sky." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Exactly. Conversely, if there are no enemies, you don’t need flight. Except for some birds like migratory species that must keep moving." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Then among the birds that used to fly, one clever bird realized something." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Huh? Actually, Antarctica is so cold there might be no predators? So maybe flying isn’t necessary?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0544.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Oh, I see. There aren’t many animals that could be predators in Antarctica’s climate." ]])

    --//CG：ペンギンの歴史②～歩き始めたペンギン～
    LAYER_LOAD(50, "CI062a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The other birds around probably laughed at that rebel." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Of course. To the other birds, a flightless bird is just a chicken—a bird that lost its individuality." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "But over time, it became clear who was right." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0372.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The birds that kept flying in such harsh conditions wore out quickly, and finally realized there was no need to fly." ]])

    --//CG：ペンギンの歴史③～現在のペンギン～
    LAYER_LOAD(50, "CI063a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0373.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Other birds began imitating the one walking on the ground. The minority who was ahead of their time caught up by the era, and penguins became the majority." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0374.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That was my evolution lecture, full of personal opinion, bias, and jokes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0375.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’m sure there are objections or [citation needed] and so on, but I won’t accept any of that. Please understand." ]])

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")


    --//SE：拍手（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav")
WAIT(400)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0545.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile · Casual clothes
 "Akira knows everything. I’ll tell Lira-san about this next time." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0546.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised · Casual clothes
 "Hmm? But how does the penguin story connect to Yuriai Private Academy?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0376.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "What I want to say is that when you start a challenge, everyone is a minority. It’s natural to be pointed at by the majority." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0377.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Games, once listed as the top harmful thing for education, have even become competitive esports." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "‘Yuri’ and ‘crossdressing boys,’ once played for laughs, are now legitimate moe attributes." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious · Roomwear
 "If you believe you're right, you mustn’t care about the majority. No matter how much you’re laughed at or criticized, you have to continue down the path you believe in." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious · Roomwear
 "Just like a penguin that once started toddling on the ground." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0547.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile · Casual clothes
 "...Thank you, Akira. You’ve given me courage." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I sincerely expressed my gratitude to Akira, who even took the trouble to draw a picture to encourage me. ]])

    MSG([[ She doesn’t say it openly very often, but I’m sure she’s worried about me this time as well. ]])

    MSG([[ That gentle side is also part of Akira’s charm... I thought with deep feeling. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0548.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile · Casual clothes
 "By the way, at this pace, how about you come outside with me, Akira? Evolution won’t happen if you’re afraid of being looked down on." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Ah, no thanks. I’m the type of creature whose ability to go out has degenerated to protect from external threats." ]])

    MSG([[ I was flatly rejected. ]])

    MSG([[ T-This creature is tough. It’s going to take a long time for Akira to evolve. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal · Roomwear
 "Alright, alright. For now, I’ll focus on evolving my crossdressing for the Princess Election. As usual, please choose which abilities to improve."]])
    --//選択肢


    -- 　①ビジュアルの訓練
    -- 　②教養の訓練
    -- 　③精神の訓練

    local result = TrainingSelect()

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 選択肢分岐
    Training(result , "EP03_19")
end
